description:
Honda’s back... but he’s not who he appears to be when he kidnaps Mokuba!  It’s time for Kaiba to stop monkeying around and rescue his brother, but he’s confronted by Big 5 Leichter!  Will Kaiba be able to defeat him in time before he loses the lead on his brother?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sarawareta Mokuba: Kaiba vs Psycho Shocker
さらわれたモクバ 海馬VSサイコショッカー
